name: chatkit-browser-use
description: AI-powered browser automation integrated with ChatKit that lets AI control web browsers to complete tasks autonomously
long_description:
ChatKit Browser-Use is a powerful extension that enables AI assistants to control real web browsers through an AI agent. It can navigate websites, fill forms, extract data, and perform complex multi-step tasks autonomously. Perfect for web scraping, testing, research, and automation workflows.

### Key Features:
- **Autonomous AI Agent**: High-level task execution with minimal supervision
- **Direct Browser Control**: Navigate, click, type, and interact with any website
- **Content Extraction**: Smart extraction of structured data from web pages
- **Tab Management**: Handle multiple tabs and complex workflows
- **Vision Capabilities**: Use screenshots for visual understanding
- **Security Features**: Domain restrictions and sandboxed execution
- **ChatKit Integration**: Seamless integration with OpenAI ChatKit

### Use Cases:
- Web scraping and data extraction
- Automated testing and QA
- Research and information gathering
- Form filling and submissions
- Multi-step workflow automation

tools.name: retry_with_browser_use_agent
tools.description: Execute a high-level task using the AI browser agent. Best for complex multi-step workflows

tools.name: browser_navigate
tools.description: Navigate to a URL in the current tab or open a new tab

tools.name: browser_click
tools.description: Click on an element by its index from browser_get_state

tools.name: browser_type
tools.description: Type text into an input field identified by its index

tools.name: browser_get_state
tools.description: Get the current page state including all interactive elements with their indices

tools.name: browser_extract_content
tools.description: Extract structured content from the page using AI

tools.name: browser_scroll
tools.description: Scroll the page up or down

tools.name: browser_go_back
tools.description: Navigate back to the previous page

tools.name: browser_switch_tab
tools.description: Switch to a different tab by its index

tools.name: browser_close_tab
tools.description: Close a specific tab by its index

allowed_domains.title: Allowed Domains
allowed_domains.description: Comma-separated list of domains the browser can access
